metadata.title: CVE-2021-22221 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from12.9.0 before 13.10.5, all versions starting from 13.11.0 before 13.11.5,all versions starting from 13.12.0 before 13.12.2. Insufficient expiredpassword validation in various operations allow user to maintain limitedaccess after their password expired

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
